scenario.sendRequestSIP: SUBSCRIBE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[HardAddressUAS]> From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[NewBranchId] Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] SUBSCRIBE Max-Forwards: 70 Accept: application/conference-info+xml Event: conference Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, PRACK Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> User-Agent: [UserAgent] Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Expires: 3600 Server: PoC-client/OMA1.0 Siemens/v2.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Content-Length: 0
